description: Mic service toggle gates injection without app restart
steps: Connect to a discovered PC in SettingsActivity
Enable mic_service_enabled and start recording in a hooked app
Disable mic_service_enabled and verify injected override stops
Enable mic_service_enabled again and verify stream resumes with latest pc_ip and pc_port

description: Discovery loop survives malformed UDP packets
steps: Start DiscoveryClient listener on discovery port
Receive malformed or non-JSON UDP packet
Verify listener keeps running after parsing error
Verify stale peers are pruned after timeout

description: PC streamer supports auto input selection and CLI flags
steps: Run audio_streamer.py with --list to enumerate input devices
Run audio_streamer.py without --device and verify default input selection path
Run audio_streamer.py with --device <id> and verify selected device path
Verify stream open retries with lower channel counts when initial open fails

description: GitHub Build APK workflow succeeds and uploads artifact
steps: Trigger Build APK workflow on GitHub
Wait for run completion and verify success conclusion
